references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced NeRFs, a foundational model for 3D scene representation that heavily influences the field of novel view synthesis and 3D inpainting.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduced 3D Gaussian splatting, a key method used in the current work for representing and manipulating 3D scenes efficiently.

references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF: A multiscale representation for anti-aliasing neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper presented Mip-NeRF, a significant improvement over NeRFs, addressing aliasing issues and enhancing the quality of novel view synthesis.

references.paper_title: Context encoders: Feature learning by inpainting
references.reason: This paper introduced context encoders, a pioneering deep learning approach to image inpainting, which paved the way for many subsequent advancements in this field.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced high-resolution image synthesis using latent diffusion models, providing a powerful technique for generating realistic images with fine details, which is relevant to the inpainting task.
